meanings.definition: Regard with respect or warm approval.
meanings.sent1: I admire my teacher for her kindness and patience.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire famous artists for their talent.
meanings.sent3: I admire how my cat can always find the coziest spot to nap.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in colors that made me admire nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: She always wore a smile that made it easy to admire her positive attitude.

meanings.sent1: I admire the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Children admire the colorful balloons at the fair.
meanings.sent3: I admire the way my dog wags his tail when he's happy.
meanings.sent4: The sparkling stars in the night sky make me admire the vast universe.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the painting made me stop and admire its beauty.

meanings.definition: To regard with wonder, pleasure, or approval.
meanings.sent1: I admire the stunning view from the mountaintop.
meanings.sent2: Tourists admire the historical architecture of the city.
meanings.sent3: I admire how my friend always knows how to make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The graceful movements of the ballet dancers made the audience admire their skill.
meanings.sent5: The chef's delicious creations made everyone admire his culinary talent.
